text: @kaitlancollins His approval is in the toilet, Kayleigh McEnany, and his Covid response does speak for itself. It's why we are in the state we are in and why his polls are tanking among other things. Enough with the Kool Aid. #TrumpFailedAmerica #Trump #COVID19 #coronavirus #Cult45  @PressSec
